beforeLoginParagraph: A digital platform helping farmers sell their produce at fair prices, access inputs on credit, and grow confidently.
beforeLoginSec1Paragraph: Our mission is to create a reliable ecosystem where farmers can sell directly at company-fixed fair prices, receive seeds and fertilizers at cost, and access interest-free credit for 3 months.
beforeLoginSec2Cont1Paragraph: Sell produce directly to buyers at guaranteed company-set rates—no middlemen involved.
beforeLoginSec2Cont2Paragraph: Get seeds and fertilizers on credit with 0% interest if repaid within 3 months.
beforeLoginSec2Cont3Paragraph: Access high-quality seeds and fertilizers at cost—no markups, no exploitation.
beforeLoginSec2Cont4Paragraph: Missed the 3-month window? Get 3% monthly interest if sold via platform, 7% otherwise.
beforeLoginSec2Cont5Paragraph: Maintain a digital profile with land, crop, and transaction details for easier credit & services.
beforeLoginSec2Cont6Paragraph: Get farming tips, government scheme updates, and NGO assistance—all in your language.
heading: Empowering Farmers and Buyers through a Transparent Agriculture Platform
missionContent: We are committed to supporting India's farmers by providing fair pricing, affordable agricultural inputs, and a platform to connect with trusted buyers. Our mission is to simplify the agricultural ecosystem through technology.
farmerService1: Apply online for fertilizers and seeds with flexible credit options
farmerService2: Sell your crops/products via online form submission
farmerService3: Get guaranteed, fair prices set by the platform
farmerService5: Access farming tips and government/NGO programs
buyerService1: Fill out the website form to buy fresh produce directly.
buyerServic2: Get admin support for any queries or product concerns
adminHelp4: Oversee platform activities and ensure transparency
footerContent: Krishi-Mitra is a platform dedicated to supporting farmers and buyers. We help farmers sell their produce at fair prices, access seeds and fertilizers online, and get credit with flexible repayment. Buyers can raise queries and connect easily.
farmerFormContParagraph: Take control of your farming journey today. Apply online for seeds, fertilizers, or start selling your crops with ease!
